product_name: YETI Basket for Tundra 35 and 45 Cooler
long_description: Keep your food cold without submerging it in melting ice--this YETI Basket fits in the YETI Tundra 35 and 45 coolers, providing an easy way to organize and separate food and beverages.
short_description: Keep your food cold without submerging it in melting ice--this YETI Basket fits in the YETI Tundra 35 and 45 coolers, providing an easy way to organize and separate food and beverages.
